title: What is Domain?
text: The domain is the set of x-values accepted by the function.
speech: The domain is the set of x-values accepted by the function.
pacedSpeech: The domain is the set of x-values accepted by the function.

title: Finding the Domain
text: Since this function accepts all values of $$x$$, its domain is $$(-\infty,\infty)$$
speech: Since this function accepts all values of , x , its domain is , the open interval from negative infinity to infinity

, its domain is  , the open interval from negative infinity to infinity
